TEXT.TITLE: WISCONSIN PUBLIC SERVICE <WPS> RAISES BUDGET
TEXT.BODY: Wisconsin Public Service Corp said in its annual report the company's five-year construction program, 1987 through 1991, is projected at 330 mln dlrs. It said the amount, which includes about 4.0 mln dlrs for sulfur dioxide controls at company power plants, is 42 mln dlrs more than the previous five-year period. Wisconsin Public Service also said natural gas sales dropped 22 pct, mainly because of the growing trend of large industrial customers to purchase gas directly from producers. Reuter
